{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Remnants of Tetenanco|It|Remnants of Tetenanco}} is a cluster of ruins left behind by the ancient [[dragon]]s. It is believed to have been a satellite city that was destroyed during the war between the dragons and the first [[Pyro Archon]], [[Xbalanque]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|A Brief History of Rocks}}</ref></p>}}

Today, people refer to these ruins as the "Remnants of the Secret Source excavation site." It is guarded by [[Mposo]].
